quests.name: A Long-Awaited Invitation
objectives: Hades and Maleficent refuse to make peace.
Talk to the Lorekeeper for advice.
Reorder "The Spark of Spite" in the Lorekeeper's pages.

Gather the materials for the invitations:
  ‧ 3 Fuchsia Eternal Poppies.
  ‧ 3 Pink Rose.
  ‧ 12 Petrified Wood.
  ‧ 14 Fairy Bubbles.
  ‧ 14 Lightning Spice.

Invite the villainous pair to the gathering:
  ‧ Deliver the invitation to Maleficent in her castle.
  ‧ Make sure Maleficent's invitation is in your Inventory.
  ‧ Deliver the invitation to Hades.
  ‧ Make sure Hades' invitation is in your Inventory.
Talk to the Lorekeeper when you're ready to start the meeting.
Watch as the Mistress of All Evil and the Lord of the Underworld finally meet.

Maleficent has vanished!
  ‧ Talk to the Lorekeeper.
  ‧ Talk to Hades.
